name: entityNew
description: Creates a new instance of the persistent CFC with the entity name that you provide.

params.name: entityName
params.description: Entity name of the persistent CFC.

params.name: properties
params.description: Key-value pair (CF struct) of property names and values.

coldfusion.notes: This function has been enhanced in ColdFusion 9.0.1 to support multiple data sources in the same application.

examples.title: Create a new ORM entity
examples.description: Use entityNew to get a new instance of an Employee entity.
